metadata.title: CVE-2020-15436 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in fs/block_dev.c in the Linux kernel before5.8 allows local users to gain privileges or cause a denial of service byleveraging improper access to a certain error field.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-187.217~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1076.80').
linux-azure package in trusty is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1093.103~14.04.1').
